localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

localize.title: Reddit 熱門
localize.description: 用中文瀏覽Reddit熱門內容

nodes.excerpt: A time tracking app focused on life itself rather than projects, tasks, and more specific types. It helps to generalize a day and make it easier to document your life. It just takes 5 seconds to log your day. You don't have to remember each minute.
nodes.title: Horae - Measure your life, log your hours and document your life
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

localize.description: 一款专注于生活本身的时间追踪应用，而不是项目、任务和更具体的类型。它有助于概括一天的生活，让你更容易记录生活。它只需要5秒钟就可以记录你的一天。你不必记住每一分钟。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，记录你的时间，记录你的生活。

localize.description: 一款專注於生活本身的時間追蹤應用，而不是項目、任務和更具體的類型。它有助於概括一天的生活，讓你更容易記錄生活。它只需要5秒鐘就可以記錄你的一天。你不必記住每一分鐘。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，記錄你的時間，記錄你的生活。

nodes.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
nodes.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life
nodes.author: John Caffier

localize.description: 人生是一场神奇的旅行，为什么不从中获得一些纪念品呢？1. 打开应用程序。2. 写下当天你所感谢的3件事。3. 就这样吧! 我们正在努力开发令人兴奋的功能。祝你在创新的纪念品感恩追踪器应用中玩得开心!
localize.tagline: 追踪生活中美好事物的感恩日记。

localize.description: 人生是一場神奇的旅行，爲什麼不從中獲得一些紀念品呢？1. 打開應用程序。2. 寫下當天你所感謝的3件事。3. 就這樣吧! 我們正在努力開發令人興奮的功能。祝你在創新的紀念品感恩追蹤器應用中玩得開心!
localize.tagline: 追蹤生活中美好事物的感恩日記。

nodes.excerpt: CoinGecko provides a fundamental analysis of the crypto market. In addition to tracking price, volume and market capitalization, CoinGecko tracks community growth, open-source code development, major events and on-chain metrics.
nodes.title: CoinGecko - 360-degree overview of the crypto market
nodes.author: Mahesh Shrestha

localize.description: CoinGecko提供加密市场的基本分析。除了跟踪价格、交易量和市值，CoinGecko还跟踪社区增长、开源代码开发、重大事件和链上指标。
localize.tagline: 加密市场的360度概述

localize.description: CoinGecko提供加密市場的基本分析。除了跟蹤價格、交易量和市值，CoinGecko還跟蹤社區增長、開源代碼開發、重大事件和鏈上指標。
localize.tagline: 加密市場的360度概述

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
nodes.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 拉美地区公司的端到端支出管理。发放无限的实体卡或虚拟卡，为每张卡设置限额，实时了解您团队的支出情况，并在发票匹配等繁琐任务上节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 为拉美地区的公司提供清晰、简化的支出管理。

localize.description: 拉美地區公司的端到端支出管理。發放無限的實體卡或虛擬卡，爲每張卡設置限額，實時瞭解您團隊的支出情況，並在發票匹配等繁瑣任務上節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲拉美地區的公司提供清晰、簡化的支出管理。

nodes.excerpt: Hypernotes is a knowledge management app with bi-directional linking, outlining, and super-powered collaboration features.
nodes.title: Hypernotes - Create, share, and understand knowledge in a new way
nodes.author: Martin Welker

localize.description: Hypernotes是一款具有双向链接、勾画和超强协作功能的知识管理应用。
localize.tagline: 以新的方式创造、分享和理解知识。

localize.description: Hypernotes是一款具有雙向鏈接、勾畫和超強協作功能的知識管理應用。
localize.tagline: 以新的方式創造、分享和理解知識。

nodes.excerpt: WOMBO is the world’s best AI-powered lip sync app 👨‍🎤👩‍🎤 All you have to do is add a selfie, pick a song, and let WOMBO work its magic. The result? Videos that are hilarious, bizarre, fun, and ready to go viral. No singing lessons required.
nodes.title: WOMBO - Make your selfies sing
nodes.author: Akshat Jagga

localize.description: WOMBO是世界上最好的人工智能驱动的唇语同步应用👨🎤Դ🎤，你要做的就是添加一张自拍照，选择一首歌曲，让WOMBO发挥它的魔力。结果呢？幽默、怪异、有趣的视频，随时可以传播。不需要任何歌唱课程。
localize.tagline: 让你的自拍唱歌

localize.description: WOMBO是世界上最好的人工智能驅動的脣語同步應用👨🎤Դ🎤，你要做的就是添加一張自拍照，選擇一首歌曲，讓WOMBO發揮它的魔力。結果呢？幽默、怪異、有趣的視頻，隨時可以傳播。不需要任何歌唱課程。
localize.tagline: 讓你的自拍唱歌

nodes.excerpt: Waterful is a fresh take on water reminder apps. With multiple healthy challenges to take, friendly notifications to follow & our cute octopus to keep you company, staying hydrated becomes fun.
nodes.title: Waterful - Turn daily hydration into a fun habit
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Waterful是一个新鲜的水提醒应用程序。有了多种健康的挑战，友好的通知和我们可爱的章鱼陪伴你，保持水分变得有趣。
localize.tagline: 将日常补水变成一种有趣的习惯

localize.description: Waterful是一個新鮮的水提醒應用程序。有了多種健康的挑戰，友好的通知和我們可愛的章魚陪伴你，保持水分變得有趣。
localize.tagline: 將日常補水變成一種有趣的習慣

nodes.excerpt: Graze is the first true Video Based Social Networking App. Why waste endless time messaging and going on disappointing dates? Instead, you can spend 5 minutes or less on a Video Chat to find out if you have chemistry and a dynamic worth exploring in person.
nodes.title: Graze - Video first social networking for dating & meeting friends
nodes.author: Heather Hopkins

localize.description: Graze是第一个真正的基于视频的社交网络应用。为什么要浪费无尽的时间发信息和进行令人失望的约会？相反，您可以花5分钟或更少的时间进行视频聊天，看看你们是否有化学反应和值得亲自探索的动态。
localize.tagline: 视频第一社交网络的约会和认识朋友

localize.description: Graze是第一個真正的基於視頻的社交網絡應用。爲什麼要浪費無盡的時間發信息和進行令人失望的約會？相反，您可以花5分鐘或更少的時間進行視頻聊天，看看你們是否有化學反應和值得親自探索的動態。
localize.tagline: 視頻第一社交網絡的約會和認識朋友

nodes.excerpt: Organize and collaborate on trips with friends and family! Completely FREE, with per-plan privacy, real-time syncing, Google maps integration, apps on web and mobile, offline mode, and more! Say goodbye to your planning headaches and start planning with Plip
nodes.title: Plip Trip Planner - Organize and collaborate on trips with friends and family
nodes.author: Max Korbel

localize.description: 组织和协作与朋友和家人的旅行! 完全免费，拥有每个计划的隐私，实时同步，谷歌地图集成，网络和移动应用程序，离线模式等! 告别您对计划的头疼，开始使用Plip进行计划吧
localize.tagline: 组织和协作与朋友和家人的旅行。

localize.description: 組織和協作與朋友和家人的旅行! 完全免費，擁有每個計劃的隱私，實時同步，谷歌地圖集成，網絡和移動應用程序，離線模式等! 告別您對計劃的頭疼，開始使用Plip進行計劃吧
localize.tagline: 組織和協作與朋友和家人的旅行。

nodes.excerpt: Easy way to get data from general public and Easy way to join research and earn money! Conre is connecting researchers to participants with mobile apps Free to post and join research in Conre!
nodes.title: Conre - Easy data or easy money: Connect researchers to participants
nodes.author: Leo Chi U Seak

localize.description: 从普通大众中获取数据的简单方法，以及加入研究和赚钱的简单方法！Conre是连接研究者和参与者的移动应用程序。Conre通过移动应用程序将研究者和参与者联系起来，在Conre中免费发布和加入研究!
localize.tagline: 数据容易，钱也容易。将研究人员与参与者联系起来

localize.description: 從普通大衆中獲取數據的簡單方法，以及加入研究和賺錢的簡單方法！Conre是連接研究者和參與者的移動應用程序。Conre通過移動應用程序將研究者和參與者聯繫起來，在Conre中免費發佈和加入研究!
localize.tagline: 數據容易，錢也容易。將研究人員與參與者聯繫起來

nodes.excerpt: Preki is a B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam, where retailers can source goods through a mobile app and direct vendor links. Their mission is to help both retailers and vendors grow their businesses and offer them the tools necessary to do just that.
nodes.title: Preki - B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Preki是拉脱维亚的B2B批发市场，零售商可以通过移动应用和直接的供应商链接采购商品。他们的使命是帮助零售商和供应商发展他们的业务，并为他们提供必要的工具来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 拉脱维亚的B2B批发市场

localize.description: Preki是拉脫維亞的B2B批發市場，零售商可以通過移動應用和直接的供應商鏈接採購商品。他們的使命是幫助零售商和供應商發展他們的業務，併爲他們提供必要的工具來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 拉脫維亞的B2B批發市場

nodes.excerpt: Verso is a universal mobile cashback application available on iOS and android. Verso rewards user's purchases made from the app in BTU cryptocurrency. BTU can be redeemed into any gift card of the user's choice inside the app.
nodes.title: Verso - Earn free crypto as cashback
nodes.author: Verso

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移动返现应用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密货币奖励用户在应用内的购物。BTU可以在应用内兑换成用户选择的任何礼品卡。
localize.tagline: 赚取免费的加密货币作为现金回馈

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移動返現應用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密貨幣獎勵用戶在應用內的購物。BTU可以在應用內兌換成用戶選擇的任何禮品卡。
localize.tagline: 賺取免費的加密貨幣作爲現金回饋

nodes.excerpt: WishU is a free and intuitive mobile app that simplifies group celebratory video creation for any occasion. Create an event and contribute videos and app stitches it masterfully. It is free!
nodes.title: WishU - Create a group celebratory video for someone special
nodes.author: Ram

localize.description: WishU是一款免费且直观的移动应用，它简化了任何场合下的集体庆祝视频创作。创建一个事件，并贡献视频和应用程序缝合它巧妙。它是免费的
localize.tagline: 为某个特别的人创建一个集体庆祝视频

localize.description: WishU是一款免費且直觀的移動應用，它簡化了任何場合下的集體慶祝視頻創作。創建一個事件，並貢獻視頻和應用程序縫合它巧妙。它是免費的
localize.tagline: 爲某個特別的人創建一個集體慶祝視頻

nodes.excerpt: Our next generation of Flutter, built for web, mobile, and desktop Today, Google's announcing Flutter 2: a major upgrade to Flutter that enables developers to create beautiful, fast, and portable apps for any platform.
nodes.title: Flutter 2.0 - Build beautiful native apps in record time, now on web too

nodes.excerpt: Blushh is an app where women in Asia listen to short sensual audio stories to explore their fantasies. With a simple monthly subscription, we are an alternative to male-oriented pornography.

localize.description: Blushh是一个应用程序，在这里，亚洲女性聆听短小的感性音频故事，探索他们的幻想。只需简单的月费，我们就能成为男性导向色情的另一种选择。

nodes.excerpt: Veganzone is a new mobile application where people who follow vegan & vegetarian lifestyle can share their common values, meet each other, socialize over the events they create and purchase vegan products.
nodes.title: Veganzone - By vegans for vegans and vegetarians
nodes.author: Murat Aksu

localize.description: Veganzone是一个新的移动应用，在这里，遵循素食和素食生活方式的人们可以分享他们的共同价值观，相互认识，通过他们创造的活动进行社交，并购买素食产品。
localize.tagline: 由素食者为素食者和素食者提供服务

localize.description: Veganzone是一個新的移動應用，在這裏，遵循素食和素食生活方式的人們可以分享他們的共同價值觀，相互認識，通過他們創造的活動進行社交，併購買素食產品。

nodes.excerpt: TeenUP was created to give kids a platform to learn new skills each day from their peers. The app allows kids to quickly and easily create short, unique, educational videos to share with friends and the world.
nodes.title: TeenUp - A learning platform designed for teens by teens
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: TeenUP的创立是为了给孩子们提供一个平台，让他们每天都能从同伴那里学到新的技能。该应用允许孩子们快速、轻松地创建短小、独特、有教育意义的视频，与朋友和世界分享。
localize.tagline: 由青少年设计的青少年学习平台

localize.description: TeenUP的創立是爲了給孩子們提供一個平臺，讓他們每天都能從同伴那裏學到新的技能。該應用允許孩子們快速、輕鬆地創建短小、獨特、有教育意義的視頻，與朋友和世界分享。
localize.tagline: 由青少年設計的青少年學習平臺

nodes.excerpt: Pastimes is a mobile app and community that makes it easy to connect with like-minded outdoor enthusiasts.
nodes.title: Pastimes - Find friends who do your favorite activities

localize.description: Pastimes 是一款移动应用和社区，让你轻松与志同道合的户外爱好者建立联系。
localize.tagline: 寻找做你喜欢的活动的朋友

localize.tagline: 尋找做你喜歡的活動的朋友

nodes.excerpt: Get yourself comfortable, turn your phone so the flashlight is facing you, close your eyes then fall effortlessly into an immersive journey through a kaleidoscope of colours created by your subconscious...
nodes.title: Lumenate - Effortlessly explore your subconscious
nodes.author: Tom Galea

localize.description: 让自己舒服一点，把手机转过来，让手电筒面对着你，闭上眼睛，然后毫不费力地陷入由你的潜意识所创造的万花筒式色彩的沉浸式旅程中。

nodes.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
nodes.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp

localize.description: TeamTime是专门为https://basecamp.com 用户设计的最简单、最精简、最安全的时间记录工具（移动和网络）。我们在与其他工具斗争后，为https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 创建了它。我们把它与你分享。

localize.description: TeamTime是專門爲https://basecamp.com 用戶設計的最簡單、最精簡、最安全的時間記錄工具（移動和網絡）。我們在與其他工具鬥爭後，爲https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 創建了它。我們把它與你分享。

nodes.excerpt: Your favorite tool for sales, marketing, and customer support - erxes - is now available on the go. Keep the ball rolling at any time by managing deals, responding to messages, and updating your CRM. For busy days on the go, erxes mobile is the way to go.
nodes.title: erxes Mobile - Some of the most important CRM and web chat tools on the go
nodes.author: Kevin William David
